@InfiniteIndefinite - ZOMG you're totally right I searched and searched and searched and can't find it anywhere online, only excerpts... 

As soon as I can I will be purchasing the book itself and scan it and upload it. I have read other works by Jacques Ellul but not that one...he is a great philosopher and I really should get around to reading his book about Propaganda....

Those who are behind all global events are not in Izrael but in London ,USA, Paris,Italy etc.
Izrael is fighting for his existance and he is manipulated with those Iluminaty same way like any other....
